item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Foster's Restaurant
New Haven, CT 06510
(203) 859-6666
Owner-Dave Foster
Manager-Scott
http://fostersrestaur...

Come join the NHC at one of New Haven's vibrant new restaurant's; Foster's. They are normally closed on Mondays, however; with a promise of a minimum of 40 attendees, they will open just for us. Yay for NHC!!!


Drink Specials:

$2 off ALL Drinks
$3 Beer - Manager's Choice

Food:
A selection from appetizers from their menu.

Contact is Robyn-Allise: 203-823-5302

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour-Foster's Restaurant...Just for NHC (and Friends)
